name: Corner Trowel
details: These are more common than the outside corner trowel, just because corner aid is used on the outside corners.

name: Pick Axe
details: It is employed for rough dressing of stones and to split the stones in the quarry. It has a long head pointed at both ends.

name: Mash Hammer
details: A mash hammer is also known as a stone masonâ€™s hammer. It is used to hit and drive chisel for rough dressing of stone.

name: Circular Saw
details: A circular saw is either hand held or affixed to a substrate. It runs on electricity and is provided with a toothed
